rules.formula: and($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , not(ISBLANK(authorizationID__c)), or(contains(examSeriesCode__c , "CKYCA"), contains(examSeriesCode__c , "CTMA"), contains(examSeriesCode__c , "CAMS6"), contains(examSeriesCode__c , "CGSS") ), contains(examSeriesCode__c , "FRA"), isblank(Result__c ), Do_not_send_communication__c =false, isblank(Private_access_code__c), not(isblank(clientAuthorizationID__c)), not(isblank(clientCandidateID__c )), not(contains(SKU__c ,"ING")))
